## my.prn

```{r}
my.prn <-
  function (x, txt) {
    calltext <- as.character (sys.call ())[2]
    if (! missing(txt)) {
      if (nchar (txt) + nchar (calltext) + 3 > .Options$width)
        calltext <- paste ("\n\n ", calltext, sep = "")
      else txt <- paste (txt, " ", sep = "")
      cat("\n", txt, calltext, "\n\n", sep = "")
    }
    else cat("\n", calltext, "\n\n", sep = "")
    invisible (print(x))
  }
#' @examples
x <- 1
my.prn(x)
my.prn(x,letters)
```
